Entries.DialogueText: Oh, that's right... I heard someone new was moving onto that old farm.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, that's right... I heard someone new was moving onto that old farm.

Entries.DialogueText: It's kind of a shame, really. I always enjoyed exploring those overgrown fields by myself. {Portrait:Custom:9}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's kind of a shame, really. I always enjoyed exploring those overgrown fields by myself.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, sure. Let's do it. We can be embarrassed together. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, sure. Let's do it. We can be embarrassed together.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you remembered my birthday... Thanks, {Farmer_Name}! This is really nice! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you remembered my birthday... Thanks, ! This is really nice!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you remembered my birthday... Thanks, {Farmer_Name}! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you remembered my birthday... Thanks, !

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, it's, uh... *sniff*... what is it? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, it's, uh... *sniff*... what is it?

Entries.DialogueText: Wow... the color is so beautiful, like an amethyst. Thanks!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow... the color is so beautiful, like an amethyst. Thanks!

Entries.DialogueText: Disgusting... I love it! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Disgusting... I love it!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, this is my favorite magazine! My Dad won't let me have a subscription, so I have to get it on the black market like this... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, this is my favorite magazine! My Dad won't let me have a subscription, so I have to get it on the black market like this...

Entries.DialogueText: Whoa, that's a creepy looking book... I love it!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whoa, that's a creepy looking book... I love it!

Entries.DialogueText: *Flip* *flip* *flip*... Ooh... It's full of monsters... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *Flip* *flip* *flip*... Ooh... It's full of monsters...

Entries.DialogueText: I'll have to study this before going into the caves... Thanks!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll have to study this before going into the caves... Thanks!

Entries.DialogueText: Whoa... Where'd you find this? The workmanship is fascinating...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whoa... Where'd you find this? The workmanship is fascinating...

Entries.DialogueText: It's a little too rusty to use, but I'll add it to my collection.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a little too rusty to use, but I'll add it to my collection.

Entries.DialogueText: This makes you wonder... Thousands of years ago, there was probably a little purple-haired cavewoman who played this flute, just like me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This makes you wonder... Thousands of years ago, there was probably a little purple-haired cavewoman who played this flute, just like me.

Entries.DialogueText: ...I'll have to wash it before pressing it to my lips, though. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I'll have to wash it before pressing it to my lips, though.

Entries.DialogueText: Wow... it's just my color! Thanks, {Farmer_Name}! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow... it's just my color! Thanks, !

Entries.DialogueText: Thank you! This is my favorite stone. It's so pretty.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thank you! This is my favorite stone. It's so pretty.

Entries.DialogueText: I want to go exploring, but I can tell my Mom is kind of worried. I don't want to add to her stress.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I want to go exploring, but I can tell my Mom is kind of worried. I don't want to add to her stress.

Entries.DialogueText: And just like that, everything's back to normal. It's like magic! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: And just like that, everything's back to normal. It's like magic!

Entries.DialogueText: Have you seen all the crazy trees around town? Everything looks so different... I feel like we're in a fairy world.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you seen all the crazy trees around town? Everything looks so different... I feel like we're in a fairy world.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't tell anyone, but I snuck into the old community center last night... I think it's haunted!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't tell anyone, but I snuck into the old community center last night... I think it's haunted!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, wow... {Farmer_Name}! Are you sure you want to give this to me? It's so rare!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, wow... ! Are you sure you want to give this to me? It's so rare!

Entries.DialogueText: I'll admit, my mouth is watering already... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll admit, my mouth is watering already...

Entries.DialogueText: I heard you've been exploring the old mines. That sounds like fun! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard you've been exploring the old mines. That sounds like fun!

Entries.DialogueText: ...I'm working up the courage to go there myself... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I'm working up the courage to go there myself...

Entries.DialogueText: Sam and Sebastian asked me to play drums in their band... I've never played drums before, but it's actually pretty fun.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam and Sebastian asked me to play drums in their band... I've never played drums before, but it's actually pretty fun.

Entries.DialogueText: You have to learn how to move your limbs to different rhythms, at the same exact time. I feel like my brain is growing. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You have to learn how to move your limbs to different rhythms, at the same exact time. I feel like my brain is growing.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I finally beat the first level of Journey Of The Prairie King! Watching you play helped a lot.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I finally beat the first level of Journey Of The Prairie King! Watching you play helped a lot.

Entries.DialogueText: Sebastian mentioned that he heard strange music while having dinner the other night...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sebastian mentioned that he heard strange music while having dinner the other night...

Entries.DialogueText: I didn't tell him it was us! It seemed better to keep it a mystery. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I didn't tell him it was us! It seemed better to keep it a mystery.

Entries.DialogueText: The spirits have a mind of their own... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The spirits have a mind of their own...

Entries.DialogueText: Feeling pretty good about the egg hunt, huh? Well, next year you won't be so lucky... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Feeling pretty good about the egg hunt, huh? Well, next year you won't be so lucky...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm still mad that you beat me at the egg hunt last year. You'd better start practicing...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm still mad that you beat me at the egg hunt last year. You'd better start practicing...

Entries.DialogueText: Abigail is blushing, but she looks happy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Abigail is blushing, but she looks happy.

Entries.DialogueText: ...You're cute. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...You're cute.

Entries.DialogueText: Uh... {Farmer_Name}? We've been dating for almost a year. Is this going anywhere? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Uh... ? We've been dating for almost a year. Is this going anywhere?

Entries.DialogueText: I heard you and Sebastian started dating... I didn't realize you guys had a thing... {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard you and Sebastian started dating... I didn't realize you guys had a thing...

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I heard you and Sam got together... He's a really good guy! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I heard you and Sam got together... He's a really good guy!

Entries.DialogueText: We've been friends for a long time. You'd better be good to him, or you'll see my bad side!
Entries.DisplayPattern: We've been friends for a long time. You'd better be good to him, or you'll see my bad side!

Entries.DialogueText: Congratulations on the marriage. I guess this means Sebastian won't be moving to the city like he always talked about. {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Congratulations on the marriage. I guess this means Sebastian won't be moving to the city like he always talked about.

Entries.DialogueText: That'll be nice. I'd be kind of sad if I never saw him again. We've always been good friends. {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That'll be nice. I'd be kind of sad if I never saw him again. We've always been good friends.

Entries.DialogueText: Haha... I can't believe Sam is a married man, now. Who would've thought? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Haha... I can't believe Sam is a married man, now. Who would've thought?

Entries.DialogueText: Joking aside, I think he'll make a great father some day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Joking aside, I think he'll make a great father some day.

Entries.DialogueText: Did you hear about the new movie theater in town? I'm excited to check it out! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did you hear about the new movie theater in town? I'm excited to check it out!

Entries.DialogueText: I hope a mermaid visits the beach.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope a mermaid visits the beach.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm gonna ask Willy if we can take the scenic route back.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm gonna ask Willy if we can take the scenic route back.

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe we'll see a sea monster on the way back.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe we'll see a sea monster on the way back.

Entries.DialogueText: The beach is okay, but it gets boring pretty quick. I'd rather check out that dark jungle, or the volcano!
Entries.DisplayPattern: The beach is okay, but it gets boring pretty quick. I'd rather check out that dark jungle, or the volcano!

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm, you think I could sneak my guinea pig onto the island?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm, you think I could sneak my guinea pig onto the island?

Entries.DialogueText: Nah, David's probably not much of a swimmer anyways. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Nah, David's probably not much of a swimmer anyways.

Entries.DialogueText: My skin gets burnt really easily. So I'm just gonna stay under this umbrella for a while.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My skin gets burnt really easily. So I'm just gonna stay under this umbrella for a while.

Entries.DialogueText: I like it in the shade. Too much sun makes me dizzy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like it in the shade. Too much sun makes me dizzy.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey {Farmer_Name}, want to build a sand castle with me?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey , want to build a sand castle with me?

Entries.DialogueText: Actually, a sand dungeon might be cooler! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Actually, a sand dungeon might be cooler!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey {Farmer_Name}, you think you could build a raft?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey , you think you could build a raft?

Entries.DialogueText: I saw a few cool islands on the way here I want to visit.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I saw a few cool islands on the way here I want to visit.

Entries.DialogueText: An island this big has got to be hiding some buried treasure.
Entries.DisplayPattern: An island this big has got to be hiding some buried treasure.

Entries.DialogueText: Quick, get me a shovel!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Quick, get me a shovel!

Entries.DialogueText: Relax, I'm just kidding. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Relax, I'm just kidding.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Gus made me a dark purple refresher, to match my hair. It tastes great!

Entries.DisplayPattern: Bummer... Willy says we have to stay on the beach...

Entries.DisplayPattern: And I brought my sword and everything...

Entries.DisplayPattern: B... But... I wanted to dance with...

Entries.DisplayPattern: Just kidding! Of course I'm dancing with you. I love you.

Entries.DisplayPattern: That's flattering... but I'm gonna have to say no. Sorry.

Entries.DisplayPattern: What are you doing here? Just leave me alone!

Entries.DialogueText: Don't talk to me! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't talk to me!

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... I can't stay mad at you anymore, {Farmer_Name}. Let's just move on with our lives. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... I can't stay mad at you anymore, . Let's just move on with our lives.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh... I... I understand. You see me as just a friend...

Entries.DialogueText: I guess we weren't really a good match... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess we weren't really a good match...

Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hey. Taking a break from work?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hi!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hi!

Entries.DialogueText: Do you ever hang out at the cemetery? It's a peaceful place to spend some time alone.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you ever hang out at the cemetery? It's a peaceful place to spend some time alone.

Entries.DialogueText: Ugh... I'm not in a good mood right now. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ugh... I'm not in a good mood right now.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I said I'm not in a good mood... what do you want?

I know my parents mean well, but sometimes they just cannot understand my point of view. Weren't they ever young?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I know my parents mean well, but sometimes they just cannot understand my point of view. Weren't they ever young?

Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't feel like doing anything today...

Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, I just realized it's Friday.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Sometimes I totally lose track of time.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if the frogs will make an appearance soon.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh man... I've been pushing off my homework all weekend. Looks like I'll be pulling another all-nighter...

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}, what do you think happens to us after we die?
Entries.DisplayPattern: , what do you think happens to us after we die?

Entries.DialogueText: I have no idea.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I have no idea.

Entries.DialogueText: We come back as spooky ghosts.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We come back as spooky ghosts.

Entries.DialogueText: We go to Heaven.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We go to Heaven.

Entries.DialogueText: Our energy bodies enter the astral plane.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Our energy bodies enter the astral plane.

Entries.DialogueText: Nothing. We just cease to exist.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Nothing. We just cease to exist.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess you think nothing would happen, right?

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe a wicked ghost would appear!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe a wicked ghost would appear!

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm, interesting...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm, interesting...

Entries.DialogueText: Well that's an interesting theory! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well that's an interesting theory!

Entries.DialogueText: You know, that wouldn't be so bad. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, that wouldn't be so bad.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Me too. Oh! Nothing physical... just some online classes I'm taking.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, I'm glad to see you.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I want to take my mind off things for a while... how is your day going?

Entries.DisplayPattern: You came all this way to visit me? That's nice.

Entries.DisplayPattern: So have you been exploring the mountain caves at all?

Entries.DialogueText: Interesting. I'd like to go there myself one of these days. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Interesting. I'd like to go there myself one of these days.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I remember when you first arrived in town, I was a little sad that those old woods would be turned into farmland. But now I'm really glad you moved here!

Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Oh, ! Hi.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Want to hang out for a while? Here! Let me read your palm. *giggle*

Entries.DialogueText: Hi. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you feel like everything seems unreal lately?

Entries.DialogueText: Not in a bad way, though. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Not in a bad way, though.

Entries.DisplayPattern: The birds were happily chirping today. They're too simple to understand the future.

Entries.DialogueText: It's better to be like them, isn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's better to be like them, isn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: Great! I'm sure you'll be able to beat this level with ease. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Great! I'm sure you'll be able to beat this level with ease.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh? *sigh*... I guess I'll never get past this level, then...

Entries.DialogueText: See? You understand why I'm out here, then.
Entries.DisplayPattern: See? You understand why I'm out here, then.

Entries.DialogueText: I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure! {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!

Entries.DialogueText: Sure. I don't want to kill anything, either. I just want to do a little exploring without risking my neck!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sure. I don't want to kill anything, either. I just want to do a little exploring without risking my neck!

Entries.DialogueText: I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure! {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, it's because I'm a girl... isn't it? Ugh... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, it's because I'm a girl... isn't it? Ugh...

Entries.DialogueText: Why? I'm just as strong as you! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why? I'm just as strong as you!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm not some fragile princess.. I can take care of myself! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm not some fragile princess.. I can take care of myself!

Entries.DialogueText: I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure! {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!

Entries.DisplayPattern: I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!

Entries.DialogueText: I see... {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I see...

Entries.DialogueText: Yea... I guess you would be one to appreciate this somber ambience.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yea... I guess you would be one to appreciate this somber ambience.

Entries.DialogueText: ...That's true. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...That's true.

Entries.DialogueText: Yeah... I guess my own life is okay... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yeah... I guess my own life is okay...

Entries.DialogueText: ...! {Portrait:Happy}
I would feel better if I could believe that...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I would feel better if I could believe that...

Entries.DialogueText: But I don't. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I don't.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}... {Portrait:Custom:8}
{Farmer_Name}... I'm alright. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ... I'm alright.

Entries.DialogueText: ...okay. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...okay.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess when you have something to lose, it's normal to be afraid...

Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Um, okay. Sorry.

Entries.DialogueText: Summer's here. It's not really my favorite season.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Summer's here. It's not really my favorite season.

Entries.DialogueText: The air is so muggy I feel like I'm floating in soup.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The air is so muggy I feel like I'm floating in soup.

Entries.DialogueText: My pet guinea pig, David, just hates this hot weather. He's fussy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My pet guinea pig, David, just hates this hot weather. He's fussy.

Entries.DialogueText: The air is so thick with honey and nectar all summer. I almost feel dizzy. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The air is so thick with honey and nectar all summer. I almost feel dizzy.

Entries.DialogueText: Have you decorated your house at all? That's what I'd be doing if I had a house.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you decorated your house at all? That's what I'd be doing if I had a house.

Entries.DialogueText: I went to the beach last night, after dark... Sometimes you can see strange lights bobbing over the sea.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I went to the beach last night, after dark... Sometimes you can see strange lights bobbing over the sea.

Entries.DialogueText: Or maybe that was just a dream I had... It doesn't feel real anymore.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Or maybe that was just a dream I had... It doesn't feel real anymore.

Entries.DialogueText: If I knew how to use a sword I would be exploring those caves by the mountain lake right now. It's probably nice and cool in there.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If I knew how to use a sword I would be exploring those caves by the mountain lake right now. It's probably nice and cool in there.

Entries.DialogueText: Ew, I hope I don't get a tan this summer. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ew, I hope I don't get a tan this summer.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I kind of wish I had a cat. Unfortunately, my Dad is allergic to pretty much everything.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm looking forward to fall... the cool mountain breeze, the swirling red petals, the smell of mushrooms... *sigh*

Entries.DisplayPattern: In a dark cave

Entries.DisplayPattern: The old, gnarled forest

Entries.DialogueText: Joja Mega-Mall
Entries.DisplayPattern: Joja Mega-Mall

Entries.DisplayPattern: Yea! That sounds wonderful.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I would love to live in an old farmhouse like you.

Entries.DisplayPattern: The creak of a floorboard, the slow plumes of dust whispering through the rafters... There's something special about an old building, isn't there?

Entries.DisplayPattern: You're an interesting lady, . I'm glad you moved here.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm actually enjoying myself this summer.

Entries.DialogueText: I need to stretch my legs and get some fresh air today.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I need to stretch my legs and get some fresh air today.

Entries.DialogueText: I try to help out in the shop on most days. Business has been pretty bad since the Joja Mart opened, though.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I try to help out in the shop on most days. Business has been pretty bad since the Joja Mart opened, though.

Entries.DialogueText: Ever since Joja Mart shut down we've been doing great at the shop! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ever since Joja Mart shut down we've been doing great at the shop!

Entries.DialogueText: I can't wait to see some pumpkins this year. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can't wait to see some pumpkins this year.

Entries.DialogueText: The spirit's eve festival happens at the end of the season. It's pretty low-key compared to what you'd see in Zuzu City, but for a small town like this it's a lot of fun.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The spirit's eve festival happens at the end of the season. It's pretty low-key compared to what you'd see in Zuzu City, but for a small town like this it's a lot of fun.

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} AbigailHAND
Entries.DisplayPattern: # AbigailHAND

Entries.DialogueText: Last night I dreamt that my left hand had turned into a gigantic %noun. Does that mean anything?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Last night I dreamt that my left hand had turned into a gigantic . Does that mean anything?

Entries.DialogueText: Abigail doesn't seem to be interested in talking right now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Abigail doesn't seem to be interested in talking right now.

Entries.DialogueText: I can't believe you fixed up that old Community Center all by yourself. I'm really impressed.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can't believe you fixed up that old Community Center all by yourself. I'm really impressed.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you have any scarecrows on your farm?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you have any scarecrows on your farm?

Entries.DialogueText: I was thinking about dyeing my hair again... what do you think?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was thinking about dyeing my hair again... what do you think?

Entries.DialogueText: Dye it black.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Dye it black.

Entries.DialogueText: Why not blonde?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why not blonde?

Entries.DialogueText: How about bubblegum pink?
Entries.DisplayPattern: How about bubblegum pink?

Entries.DialogueText: I like your hair just the way it is!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like your hair just the way it is!

Entries.DialogueText: I was going to dye my hair but then I decided against it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was going to dye my hair but then I decided against it.

Entries.DialogueText: Yes? What is it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yes? What is it?

Entries.DialogueText: I guess that's a pretty safe choice, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess that's a pretty safe choice, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: I'll think about it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll think about it.

Entries.DialogueText: Of course that's what you'd say. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Of course that's what you'd say.

Entries.DialogueText: You're always good for a laugh. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're always good for a laugh.

Entries.DialogueText: Are you growing pumpkins on your farm this year?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you growing pumpkins on your farm this year?

Entries.DialogueText: Save one for me! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Save one for me!

Entries.DialogueText: I may fight with my parents a lot, but I know they're just looking out for me. They're doing what they think is best. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I may fight with my parents a lot, but I know they're just looking out for me. They're doing what they think is best.

Entries.DialogueText: I dunno why I'm saying this to you. Don't tell anyone. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I dunno why I'm saying this to you. Don't tell anyone.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi.

Entries.DialogueText: Your hair looks cool today... did you do something different?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Your hair looks cool today... did you do something different?

Entries.DialogueText: You know, I could actually see myself becoming a farmer some day...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, I could actually see myself becoming a farmer some day...

Entries.DialogueText: But how would that ever happen? *chuckle* {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But how would that ever happen? *chuckle*

Entries.DialogueText: I had an interesting dream last night, with you in it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I had an interesting dream last night, with you in it.

Entries.DialogueText: It was a good dream. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It was a good dream.

Entries.DialogueText: I wish the season lasted a little longer. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wish the season lasted a little longer.

Entries.DialogueText: When the wind really picks up, I almost feel like a kid again.
Entries.DisplayPattern: When the wind really picks up, I almost feel like a kid again.

Entries.DialogueText: I usually feel lonely this time of year, but not anymore. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I usually feel lonely this time of year, but not anymore.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}, what are your plans for the future?
Entries.DisplayPattern: , what are your plans for the future?

Entries.DialogueText: Well, fall is over... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, fall is over...

Entries.DialogueText: But I like winter, too! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I like winter, too!

Entries.DialogueText: It's just too cold to go outside much.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's just too cold to go outside much.

Entries.DialogueText: But I do enjoy building a snowgoon. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I do enjoy building a snowgoon.

Entries.DialogueText: Doesn't a steaming hot cup of cocoa sound good right now?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Doesn't a steaming hot cup of cocoa sound good right now?

Entries.DialogueText: Hi. Is it boring to be a farmer during the winter?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi. Is it boring to be a farmer during the winter?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm definitely going to enter the egg hunt tomorrow. Are you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm definitely going to enter the egg hunt tomorrow. Are you?

Entries.DialogueText: Well, tomorrow is the flower dance. Dancing is alright, but they make me wear this stupid white dress... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, tomorrow is the flower dance. Dancing is alright, but they make me wear this stupid white dress...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm looking forward to making a snow man tomorrow.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm looking forward to making a snow man tomorrow.

Entries.DialogueText: Will I see you tomorrow at the Spirit's Eve festival? Look for me in the haunted maze. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Will I see you tomorrow at the Spirit's Eve festival? Look for me in the haunted maze.

Entries.DialogueText: Everyone's excited for the Luau tomorrow. Maybe a little nervous, too, considering the Governor will be here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Everyone's excited for the Luau tomorrow. Maybe a little nervous, too, considering the Governor will be here.

Entries.DialogueText: You can't miss tomorrow's festival. It's one of the most beautiful wonders of the valley.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can't miss tomorrow's festival. It's one of the most beautiful wonders of the valley.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm going to eat so much cranberry sauce tomorrow. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm going to eat so much cranberry sauce tomorrow.

Entries.DialogueText: Another year is almost over.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Another year is almost over.

Entries.DialogueText: It goes by so fast, doesn't it? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It goes by so fast, doesn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: One thing I've learned living here... everyone stares at you if you look different.
Entries.DisplayPattern: One thing I've learned living here... everyone stares at you if you look different.

Entries.DialogueText: It's the weekend!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's the weekend!

Entries.DialogueText: That means I can play twice as many video games. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That means I can play twice as many video games.

Entries.DialogueText: Bye.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Bye.

Entries.DialogueText: I made these two drawings. What do you think?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I made these two drawings. What do you think?

Entries.DialogueText: I like the jungle island and the tiger.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like the jungle island and the tiger.

Entries.DialogueText: I like the orc with the battleaxe.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like the orc with the battleaxe.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't like either of them.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't like either of them.

Entries.DialogueText: Remember those drawings I showed you a while ago? I accidentally threw them away. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Remember those drawings I showed you a while ago? I accidentally threw them away.

Entries.DialogueText: Remember that drawing I showed you with the orc? I entered it into an online contest and won 50g! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Remember that drawing I showed you with the orc? I entered it into an online contest and won 50g!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh yeah? I guess that makes sense.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh yeah? I guess that makes sense.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad. It's embarrassing to share your art with others. But I think you and I are on the same page.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad. It's embarrassing to share your art with others. But I think you and I are on the same page.

Entries.DialogueText: Rude! Why would you hurt my feelings like that? You're so insensitive! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Rude! Why would you hurt my feelings like that? You're so insensitive!

Entries.DialogueText: Hi. If you're ever bored, you can always hang out in my room.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi. If you're ever bored, you can always hang out in my room.

Entries.DialogueText: As long as I'm not changing, of course!
Entries.DisplayPattern: As long as I'm not changing, of course!

Entries.DialogueText: It's so cold, I wish we had a hot cup of cocoa to share. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's so cold, I wish we had a hot cup of cocoa to share.

Entries.DialogueText: I've been daydreaming a lot lately...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been daydreaming a lot lately...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! You want to know what it's about? Well... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! You want to know what it's about? Well...

Entries.DialogueText: ...It's a secret. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...It's a secret.

Entries.DialogueText: Another year is almost over...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Another year is almost over...

Entries.DialogueText: But this was a really good year, don't you think? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But this was a really good year, don't you think?

Entries.DialogueText: It must be nice not having crops to worry about this time of year.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It must be nice not having crops to worry about this time of year.

Entries.DialogueText: And that means you can hang out with me more often! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: And that means you can hang out with me more often!

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}, there's something I want to tell you...
Entries.DisplayPattern: , there's something I want to tell you...

Entries.DialogueText: It's just... um... well... your boots! They, uh...look really clean... *gulp*
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's just... um... well... your boots! They, uh...look really clean... *gulp*

Entries.DialogueText: That's all... *sigh* {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's all... *sigh*

Entries.DialogueText: I can't trust a person who doesn't like animals...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can't trust a person who doesn't like animals...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, don't worry! I know you're an animal lover! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, don't worry! I know you're an animal lover!

Entries.DialogueText: Hehe. Me? Married? I never thought this would happen. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hehe. Me? Married? I never thought this would happen.

Entries.DialogueText: We're going to have a lot of fun together. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: We're going to have a lot of fun together.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm engaged to a farmer. Wow! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm engaged to a farmer. Wow!

Entries.DialogueText: Our lives are going to be a lot different from now on. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Our lives are going to be a lot different from now on.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Do you still love me? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Do you still love me?

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... Maybe we got married too young. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... Maybe we got married too young.

Entries.DialogueText: Are you still happy with me? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you still happy with me?

Entries.DialogueText: Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you ever wonder what else is out there? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you ever wonder what else is out there?

Entries.DialogueText: You used to be romantic... what happened? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You used to be romantic... what happened?

Entries.DialogueText: I know I'm not as young as I used to be... is that what you married me for? {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I know I'm not as young as I used to be... is that what you married me for?

Entries.DialogueText: We only have one short life to live... is this the best way to do it? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: We only have one short life to live... is this the best way to do it?

Entries.DialogueText: I used to be special to you, your best friend... now you only seem to put up with me when I make a hot dinner. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I used to be special to you, your best friend... now you only seem to put up with me when I make a hot dinner.

Entries.DialogueText: You've been so cold to me lately... What's wrong with you? You're acting like a bog spirit... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You've been so cold to me lately... What's wrong with you? You're acting like a bog spirit...

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if I could've done better... I was very good friends with Sebastian before we met. He was probably the one... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if I could've done better... I was very good friends with Sebastian before we met. He was probably the one...

Entries.DialogueText: The scent is unmistakable... mushroom, rotting leaves, pumpkin. It's fall, alright. Isn't it lovely?
Entries.DisplayPattern: The scent is unmistakable... mushroom, rotting leaves, pumpkin. It's fall, alright. Isn't it lovely?

Entries.DialogueText: Have you figured out what you're going to use for our grange display tomorrow?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you figured out what you're going to use for our grange display tomorrow?

Entries.DialogueText: Can we grow giant pumpkins this season? Please, honey? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Can we grow giant pumpkins this season? Please, honey?

Entries.DialogueText: Honey... you're worth more to me than a chest full of quartz.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Honey... you're worth more to me than a chest full of quartz.

Entries.DialogueText: Now, a chest full of amethyst? Hmm... I'd have to think about that one. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now, a chest full of amethyst? Hmm... I'd have to think about that one.

Entries.DialogueText: Should we go to the Spirit's Eve festival tomorrow night?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Should we go to the Spirit's Eve festival tomorrow night?

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... fall. This might be my favorite time of year. The colors really complement my hair, don't you think?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... fall. This might be my favorite time of year. The colors really complement my hair, don't you think?

Entries.DialogueText: Winter's just around the corner. We need to double check the heating system, turn off the valves, and check all the insulation in the house.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Winter's just around the corner. We need to double check the heating system, turn off the valves, and check all the insulation in the house.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry, I'll take care of it all.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry, I'll take care of it all.

Entries.DialogueText: Do I smell pumpkin on you? Maybe I'm just dreaming... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do I smell pumpkin on you? Maybe I'm just dreaming...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm going in to town today, just so you know. I need to stretch these legs a bit.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm going in to town today, just so you know. I need to stretch these legs a bit.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey! Did you have a good day? Mine went well. It was refreshing to take a walk. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey! Did you have a good day? Mine went well. It was refreshing to take a walk.

Entries.DialogueText: It's hard to believe we're finally married... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's hard to believe we're finally married...

Entries.DialogueText: Did you hear that? Sometimes I'm convinced this house is haunted. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did you hear that? Sometimes I'm convinced this house is haunted.

Entries.DialogueText: Welwick's horoscope predicted great things for me today. I feel really motivated!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welwick's horoscope predicted great things for me today. I feel really motivated!

Entries.DialogueText: I can't even remember the last time I dyed my hair... I swear, it never fades from this color...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can't even remember the last time I dyed my hair... I swear, it never fades from this color...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad I owned a heavy pair of boots before moving in. It's hard to imagine tip-toeing around the mud in sneakers. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad I owned a heavy pair of boots before moving in. It's hard to imagine tip-toeing around the mud in sneakers.

Entries.DialogueText: I was just admiring the mermaid's pendant you gave me... I'll proudly wear this to my grave. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was just admiring the mermaid's pendant you gave me... I'll proudly wear this to my grave.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey. I know you're smart, but I still worry about you sometimes. The world is full of monsters. {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey. I know you're smart, but I still worry about you sometimes. The world is full of monsters.

Entries.DialogueText: Just promise me you'll be careful. I don't want to lose you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just promise me you'll be careful. I don't want to lose you.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for us. I'm really proud of you. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for us. I'm really proud of you.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a simple life, but I like it. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a simple life, but I like it.

Entries.DialogueText: I always loved this place, long before you moved in. Now I can explore the farm whenever I want! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I always loved this place, long before you moved in. Now I can explore the farm whenever I want!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}. Heading out into the wild? I got you something...[286 287 205 732]
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, . Heading out into the wild? I got you something...

Entries.DialogueText: Use that if you get into a tough spot. It should help keep you safe.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Use that if you get into a tough spot. It should help keep you safe.

Entries.DialogueText: Heading to the mines? Hey... if you find something tasty, remember to bring me a piece! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heading to the mines? Hey... if you find something tasty, remember to bring me a piece!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey! I'm just debating what I should do today. I'm not used to having this much freedom!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey! I'm just debating what I should do today. I'm not used to having this much freedom!

Entries.DialogueText: You don't mind if I do some re-decorating now and then, do you? I'm still excited to have a place of my own to work on.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You don't mind if I do some re-decorating now and then, do you? I'm still excited to have a place of my own to work on.

Entries.DialogueText: There's always something new happening on our farm... I love it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's always something new happening on our farm... I love it.

Entries.DialogueText: I had a good day, today. There's always something interesting going on around here, if you look close enough.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I had a good day, today. There's always something interesting going on around here, if you look close enough.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey! Tell me about your day. Did anything exciting happen? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey! Tell me about your day. Did anything exciting happen?

Entries.DialogueText: I used to be a night owl, but I'm starting to enjoy the rhythm of life on the farm. It feels natural.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I used to be a night owl, but I'm starting to enjoy the rhythm of life on the farm. It feels natural.

Entries.DialogueText: *yawn*... I'm ready to call it a night pretty soon. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *yawn*... I'm ready to call it a night pretty soon.

Entries.DialogueText: The sounds of the night are louder out here. I'll never stop enjoying that.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The sounds of the night are louder out here. I'll never stop enjoying that.

Entries.DialogueText: Are you ready for bed soon? I turned on the electric blanket for us... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you ready for bed soon? I turned on the electric blanket for us...

Entries.DialogueText: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and shriveled. It's going to happen some day!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and shriveled. It's going to happen some day!

Entries.DialogueText: Do you think your Grandpa would be proud of us?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you think your Grandpa would be proud of us?

Entries.DialogueText: Taking a break? I guess being a farmer is easier than I thought...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Taking a break? I guess being a farmer is easier than I thought...

Entries.DialogueText: If you go into town, make sure and say hi to everyone for me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you go into town, make sure and say hi to everyone for me.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll do the laundry tomorrow morning before you get up... that way you won't have any down-time.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll do the laundry tomorrow morning before you get up... that way you won't have any down-time.

Entries.DialogueText: Are we doing okay on money, {Farmer_Name}?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are we doing okay on money, ?

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder how the old shop is doing? I should visit my parents again soon.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder how the old shop is doing? I should visit my parents again soon.

Entries.DialogueText: If you moved on to the spirit world, I'd set up a little shrine for you next to Grandpa's.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you moved on to the spirit world, I'd set up a little shrine for you next to Grandpa's.

Entries.DialogueText: No matter how much we clean, the house keeps getting dirty again.
Entries.DisplayPattern: No matter how much we clean, the house keeps getting dirty again.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess farms are kind of dirty.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess farms are kind of dirty.

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives? I might get bored.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives? I might get bored.

Entries.DialogueText: Where am I supposed to sleep...? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Where am I supposed to sleep...?

Entries.DialogueText: I wasn't able to sleep well last night... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wasn't able to sleep well last night...

Entries.DialogueText: I had to sleep on the floor last night... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I had to sleep on the floor last night...

Entries.DialogueText: Did something happen to our bed...? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did something happen to our bed...?

Entries.DialogueText: Have you spent any time with %kid1 today?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you spent any time with today?

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if %kid1 will grow up to be a farmer like you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if will grow up to be a farmer like you?

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry, I'll feed %kid1 today. You can just focus on running the farm.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry, I'll feed today. You can just focus on running the farm.

Entries.DialogueText: I can't believe I'm a "mom"... life is weird. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can't believe I'm a "mom"... life is weird.

Entries.DialogueText: The soft breeze is blowing mountain air throughout the valley today. It smells like fresh pine and sage.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The soft breeze is blowing mountain air throughout the valley today. It smells like fresh pine and sage.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... I think we've got plenty of space for outdoor slime ranching!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... I think we've got plenty of space for outdoor slime ranching!

Entries.DialogueText: Make sure to keep things tidy around your Grandpa's shrine. There's something special about it, I can feel it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Make sure to keep things tidy around your Grandpa's shrine. There's something special about it, I can feel it.

Entries.DialogueText: It's pretty cool that we have a cave on our property. It's something I always dreamed about. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's pretty cool that we have a cave on our property. It's something I always dreamed about.

Entries.DialogueText: I always forget to put some snacks in my pocket. *rumble* {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I always forget to put some snacks in my pocket. *rumble*

Entries.DialogueText: I'm just going to hang out here, okay?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm just going to hang out here, okay?

Entries.DialogueText: There's a lot of interesting bugs and things out here. *chuckle* {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's a lot of interesting bugs and things out here. *chuckle*

Entries.DialogueText: Abigail is lost in her music.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Abigail is lost in her music.

Entries.DialogueText: The dark... the rain... it gets me excited. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The dark... the rain... it gets me excited.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, remember when we played that duet by the lake? This weather reminds me of that day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, remember when we played that duet by the lake? This weather reminds me of that day.

Entries.DialogueText: You really surprised me with that mini-harp... I never expected that. I guess that's why I like you so much. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You really surprised me with that mini-harp... I never expected that. I guess that's why I like you so much.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey! I woke up early and did some exploring on my own. I found this and it reminded me of you. [768 767 769 66 82]
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey! I woke up early and did some exploring on my own. I found this and it reminded me of you.

Entries.DialogueText: Think you can find something better than that? I'm not so sure! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Think you can find something better than that? I'm not so sure!

Entries.DialogueText: It might be a good day to visit the caves, huh? Just be careful out there.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It might be a good day to visit the caves, huh? Just be careful out there.

Entries.DialogueText: If you go, bring a Life Elixir or two.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you go, bring a Life Elixir or two.

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe I'll boot up Journey Of The Prairie King today... one of these days I swear, I'll beat the whole game. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe I'll boot up Journey Of The Prairie King today... one of these days I swear, I'll beat the whole game.

Entries.DialogueText: The countryside looks more interesting on a day like this, don't you think?
Entries.DisplayPattern: The countryside looks more interesting on a day like this, don't you think?

Entries.DialogueText: I was just gazing out into the rainswept woods... I swear I saw something darker than black shifting around the trees. {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was just gazing out into the rainswept woods... I swear I saw something darker than black shifting around the trees.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a good night to see a ghost...
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a good night to see a ghost...

Entries.DialogueText: Can you feel it? There's a stillness in the rain...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Can you feel it? There's a stillness in the rain...

Entries.DisplayPattern: What am I supposed to do with this?

Entries.DialogueText: What were you thinking? This is awful!
Entries.DisplayPattern: What were you thinking? This is awful!

Entries.DialogueText: You brought me a present? Thanks.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You brought me a present? Thanks.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, don't even think about it! That's private! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, don't even think about it! That's private!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey. We had one of those {2}s you sold at the shop for dinner last night... I guess it was starting to go bad and my Dad couldn't bear to throw it out. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey. We had one of those {2}s you sold at the shop for dinner last night... I guess it was starting to go bad and my Dad couldn't bear to throw it out.

Entries.DialogueText: Unfortunately it tasted like {3}. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Unfortunately it tasted like {3}.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey. We had one of those {2}s you sold at the shop for dinner last night... I guess it was starting to go bad and my Dad couldn't bear to throw it out. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey. We had one of those {2}s you sold at the shop for dinner last night... I guess it was starting to go bad and my Dad couldn't bear to throw it out.

Entries.DialogueText: It was still pretty good, though.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It was still pretty good, though.

Entries.DialogueText: Standing here, looking out on the horizon... I get a feeling of endless possibility.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Standing here, looking out on the horizon... I get a feeling of endless possibility.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm just happy I get to explore this world, with you by my side... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm just happy I get to explore this world, with you by my side...

Entries.DialogueText: I can't believe they made a Prairie King movie... I hope it's good!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can't believe they made a Prairie King movie... I hope it's good!

Entries.DialogueText: Listen... it's got that old familiar music. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Listen... it's got that old familiar music.

Entries.DialogueText: Well the acting was awful, but I still had a great time. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well the acting was awful, but I still had a great time.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm excited to 'explore our vibrant world'... aren't you? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm excited to 'explore our vibrant world'... aren't you?

Entries.DialogueText: I didn't know that!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I didn't know that!

Entries.DialogueText: That was really interesting. I liked the raccoons the best... they're so cute! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was really interesting. I liked the raccoons the best... they're so cute!

Entries.DialogueText: I love horror movies... I hope it's scary! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I love horror movies... I hope it's scary!

Entries.DialogueText: Haha! It's not scary, but I love it. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Haha! It's not scary, but I love it.

Entries.DialogueText: Abigail is giggling!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Abigail is giggling!

Entries.DialogueText: That was pretty campy, but I liked it. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was pretty campy, but I liked it.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey! Thanks for inviting me, I love going to the movies. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey! Thanks for inviting me, I love going to the movies.

Entries.DialogueText: That was interesting... I wonder what I would've done in the same situation?
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was interesting... I wonder what I would've done in the same situation?

Entries.DialogueText: From seeing the trailer, this one looks like a real snoozefest... {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: From seeing the trailer, this one looks like a real snoozefest...

Entries.DialogueText: Wake me up if anything interesting happens. {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wake me up if anything interesting happens.

Entries.DialogueText: *yawn*... that was pretty boring, wasn't it? {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *yawn*... that was pretty boring, wasn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad you fixed up the bus! This is really fun. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad you fixed up the bus! This is really fun.

Entries.DialogueText: I've always wanted to travel beyond Pelican Town.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've always wanted to travel beyond Pelican Town.

Entries.DialogueText: I was thinking of joining you in the skull caves, but then I saw the food stand...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was thinking of joining you in the skull caves, but then I saw the food stand...

Entries.DialogueText: You go on ahead without me... just be careful!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You go on ahead without me... just be careful!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I grabbed some random stuff out of my closet. Want any of it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I grabbed some random stuff out of my closet. Want any of it?
